title: Get The Shot - No Peace In Hell  mp3  320k  2014

Get The Shot - No Peace In Hell  mp3  320k  2014 ......... 
Hailing straight from Quebec City, Canada, Get The Shot was formed in 2009 by a bunch of outcasts who wanted nothing more than a chance to spit their fury at the face of the world. The band plays an unpretentious spirited hardcore tinged with the desperation of a cold and disaffected youth.

Pulling off a sound akin to 90Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s hardcore bands like Strife and Ringworm while incorporating elements of 80Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s trash metal, its latest achievement, Ã¢â‚¬Å“No peace In HellÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ is a dark and brooding record delivered with the distinctive ferocity and violent vigour of five disillusioned spirits who have nothing left to lose.

No fashion, no frills, no lies. Get The Shot is all about rage and anger toward this harsh place we live in.


Influences:

Slayer, Anthrax, Testament, Ringworm, Integrity, All Out War, Indecision.
